sentences.sContent: It has dark color and sweet smell, medium sourness, well controlled aftertaste, no acerbity.
sentences.sContent_eng: It has dark color and sweet smell, medium sourness, well controlled aftertaste, no acerbity.
sentences.sCn: 色较深，香味充分，酸度适中，回味涩度控制的好，无涩味。

words.tran: 尖锐的；酸涩的；尖酸刻薄的

trans.tranOther: Acerbity is a kind of bitter, critical humour
